title: Emprez BI : Overview of the module
content:
Emprez BI is a module offered by Emprez. It allows you to measure the performance of your human resources using key performance indicators! 
  * Available for all manager profiles (Admin, limited admin, manager, limited manager).Only the Report-BI section is not available to the manager and limited manager profiles.




    The Emprez BI module is available in 3 parts in your Emprez manager area:



On your dashboard for an overview of the company by period
In each employee file for indicators specific to each employee
In the "Reports" menu for editing precise reports on the performance of your employeesYou will appreciate the Emprez Index so that you can compare the performance of your human resources to that of structures similar to yours.



Dashboard
Synthesized vision


Find on your Emprez dashboard, for the current month, the following indicators:



Number of late arrivals
Number of hours worked that exceed the planned schedule
Number of late end of workshifts
Number of absences


     You can change the period to display: Change the year and the month and click on 
    .


Detailed vision


    To have more details on these data click on Access to Module.

    You can thus click to refine your searches by divisions, services, departments, sub-departments, year, month. 
  

    Once the desired parameters have been selected click on Load. 
   


    You will find : 
   



Worked hours that exceed the scheduled hours
Absenteeism







Authorized absences
Non authorized absences







Late Arrivals
Late end of workshifts
Meals duration is too long
Breaks duration is too long







       Each of the sections offers you the possibility to see the employees concerned by clicking on: Employee responsible of this situation


Employee's file


       Find in each employee's file the indicators of their own performance over the current year and the previous year for a quick and easy comparison of the evolution. 
     To view data by month, click on the arrow next to the desired year.

       Here are the indicators of the file: 
     





Absences: (previous years VS current year)

Working days
Absences
Absenteeism
Authorized absences
Non authorized absences




Late Arrival: (previous years VS current year)

Late arrivals
Lateness ratio
Late End of workshifts
Meal
Breaks
Excess



Shadowings & Training: (previous years VS current year)

Shadowings
Formations









Reports 


   In the Report menu, you will find the possibility of editing 5 performance reports: 
  



Work, Late Arrivals, Absences and amount paid per employee (Emprez index available)
Work, Late Arrivals, Absences and amount paid per employee - Selection by structure and groups (Emprez index available)
Amounts paidAbsenteeism and Late Arrivals per Structure
Amounts paid per payroll for a selected PayPeriod



     To access it: click on the Reports  menu> Report - Emprez BI, then edit the desired report(s).

     Receive these reports daily or weekly directly in your mailbox. To learn more, 
    click here.

Emprez Index





    The Emprez index is an anonymous comparison of your company's data to other companies in the same group as yours, recorded in Emprez. 
  

    So you can compare your performance to similar companies for a fairer comparison.Helpful?00Updated: 1 year ago Share :
